text: The Zoo Licensing Act 1981 (1981 c. 37) was an Act of Parliament in the United Kingdom. The main effect of the Act was to regulate zoos by requiring them to be licensed by local authorities.Zoo Licensing Act, 1981, s1 (1) The Act did not extend to circuses or pet shops.Zoo Licensing Act, 1981, s1 (2) The Act does not extend to Northern Ireland.Zoo Licensing Act, 1981, s23 (3) ==References== *Whitaker's Almanack: for the year 1982, complete edition, p. 361. J. Whitaker & Sons, London, 1981 ==External links== * Category:United Kingdom Acts of Parliament 1981
title: Zoo Licensing Act 1981
